mapper.insert: insert into t_calling_record (id, fileId, ori_number, call_start, duration, cost, charge, des_number, area_prefix, type, order_id, invoice_id, description) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fileid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{oriNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{callStart,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{duration,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cost,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{charge,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{desNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areaPrefix,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{invoiceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update t_calling_record set fileId = #{fileid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ori_number = #{oriNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, call_start = #{callStart,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, duration = #{duration,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cost = #{cost,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, charge = #{charge,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, des_number = #{desNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area_prefix = #{areaPrefix,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, invoice_id = #{invoiceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, description = #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, fileId, ori_number, call_start, duration, cost, charge, des_number, area_prefix, type, order_id, invoice_id, description from t_calling_record where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
